name: Taiko Tower
description:
TAIKO TOWER
Seek the stairs beyond, Sounds of echoing taiko, Walls disappearing.
Patience to reward, Flow as one with the rhythm, Reminiscing paths.

Arrow keys to navigate the tower.
3 levels, 3 themes.
1. Classic   2. Exploration   3. Runner

Taiko Tower is a rhythm adventure game where the tower changes to drum beats. Loosely inspired by the Drum House in Kimetsu no Yaiba, and Taiko no Tatsujin. 

Made in 24 hours for Miz Jam 1, where all games are required to use the same art pack.
